p: Using the non-synonymous substitution to synonymous substitution (Ka/Ks) ratio, a total of 77 genes were calculated to identify selective pressure for the three Arnebia species, L. erythrorhizon, and B. officinalis, with T. plicata as reference ( Supplementary Figure 7). Most genes were conserved and exhibited a Ka/Ks ratio < 1. Only rbcL was positively selected in all five Boraginaceae cp genomes (Ka/Ks = 1.064â€“1.286).
